name: Luca Chitayat
description: Software Engineer pushing the boundaries of usability. Questioning common beliefs to discover novel solutions at the intersection of science and art.      Engineering and designing functional platforms for diverse technologies.

name: Patricia Dinh
description: As a results-oriented full-stack software engineer, I excel at designing elegant, intuitive, and user-centric solutions. My expertise spans JavaScript, React, jQuery, Bootstrap, C#, .NET, SQL, and REST APIs. My passion lies in developing powerful applications that not only meet technical excellence but also resonate with end-users.

name: David Miranda
description: I am a Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the consumer electronics industry. Skilled in Bug Tracking, Test Suite Creation, Testing: Functional, Feature, Regression & Compatibility. Strong quality assurance professional that is easily adaptable with a BS of Media Arts and Animation focused in Animation from The Art Institute of CA- San Francisco.

name: Orrin Ohanian
description: Hello! I'm Orrin Ohanian, a Full Stack Software Engineer with a unique journey through finance and psychology that led me to the world of technology. My diverse background has equipped me with a range of skills and perspectives that I leverage to tackle complex problems and develop innovative solutions.

name: Thane Thompson
description: Software developer and fractional operations executive with skills in C#/.NET, React, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Python, and databases. Multiple application service and development experiences with engagement / customer relationship management (CRM) and geographic information systems (GIS). Super interested in AI applications to education, science, and general knowledge transfer
